ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] compoundType with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] dispenseUnitType with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] doseForm with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] preparationTime with data type Time Quantity
Contains at least one [1..*] additive, where its type is Additive

Contains zero or more [0..*] vehicle, where its type is Vehicle
"Defines the volume measurement in which the drug strength concentration is contained. For example, Acetaminophen 120 MG/5ML Elixir means that 120 MG of the drug is in a solution with a volume of 5 ML." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-25.
